tool_description: Get Local news within Uganda instantly via this API.
name: NTV-Uganda News
title: NTV-Uganda News

api_list.name: Get News
api_list.description: Get news from within Uganda and the entire region.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ntv-uganda-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ntv-uganda-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ntv-uganda-news.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ntv-uganda-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
